title: Best of The Program | Guest: Shelley Luther | 4/30/20
description:
Tara Reade’s claims that Joe Biden sexually assaulted her are even causing some Democrats like actress Rose McGowan to grow tired of the #MeToo hypocrisy. Dallas salon owner Shelley Luther joins before heading to court and possibly jail for continuing to keep her shop open. And NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio has angered the Jewish community again after calling them out for holding a large, but city-sanctioned, funeral.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
